Header.subTitle: Weights and Measures Department
Header.paragraph: enhancing service delivery in a manner that will stimulate the growth of thedomestic economy for self-reliance .

About.paragraph1: Federal Ministry of Industry, Trade and Investment was created to play a decisive role in the diversification of the resource base of the economy by promoting trade and investment with special emphasis on increased production and export of non-oiland gas products that will lead to wealth and job creation, poverty reduction andensure enhanced service delivery in a manner that will stimulate the growth of thedomestic economy for self-reliance and export and its integration into the globalmarket taking full advantage of globalization.
About.paragraph2: The Weights and Measures Department is a department of the Federal Ministry ofIndustry, Trade and Investment, having the mandate of ensuring that all commercial transactions involving measurement are fair, accurate and legal, with aview to protecting the consumers by implementing the Weights and Measures Act of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, Cap W3 LFN 2004, contributing to the Trade and Investment facilitation drive of the parent ministry and the realization of the objectives of the Legal Metrology program being implemented by the Federal Government of Nigeria.
About.mission: To formulate and implement policies and programmes to attract investment, boost industrialization, increase trade and exports and develop eenterprises
About.vision: To promote economic growth, create jobs and generate wealth
About.Nigerco: Nigerco Nigeria Limited is an indigenous company specializing in Consultancy Services in the establishment of Custody Transfer Accuracy Measurement, Equipment installation, Calibration and Verification for Offâ€“shore and On-shore Hydrocarbon (Crude Oil and Gas) Value Chain Monitoring and Control in areas of Pre-shipment Inspection, Production Facilities Metering and Physical and Financial Flow controls. The company was incorporated in 1987 to offer Consultancy, Engineering, Legal Metrology Services, Pre-Shipment Inspection of Export and Allied services in the oil /gas industry and other sectors of the Nigerian economy.
